channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Fox, 2nd October
item.description:
Good Morning There is a headless Dead Fox in Jolly Farmers open space. Could you kindly arrange for someone to come and collect it Thank you

item.title: Medium size set of black bin bag discarded overnight, 2nd October
item.description:
Overnight to the 2nd of October someone flytipped on the corner of Highshore and Belended road. We dont have any photos of who did it. We are concerned by rodent/foxes spreading what appears to be in part food waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Highshore Road, Peckham, London

item.title: Dumping of felled fir tree, 2nd October
item.description:
A large fir tree has been pruned/felled and has been dumped in the road. My husband was injured by one of the branches when he tripped over it. We have dragged it to one side to avoid injury to other pedestrians/school children. We think this happened early morning 1st October.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fish roundabout trashed, 2nd October
item.description:
Looks like the contents of sports directs, reject home kits were vomited over the fish roundabout on Bexley road, Erith junction. You cannot see clearly through the roundabout to make a judgement on the traffic, itâ€™s distracting and will undoubtedly cause an accident with bits flying off.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 124, Bexley Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
